back_text: Deck size: 30. Deckbuilding options: Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to five level 0 cards from any other class Deckbuilding requirements (do not count toward deck size): Zoey's Cross, Smite the Wicked, 1 random basic weakness.
name: Zoey Samaras
text:
[reaction] After you become engaged with an enemy: Gain 1 resource.
[eldersign] effect: +1. If this skill test is successful during an attack, that attack deals +1 damage.

back_text: Deck size: 30. Deckbuilding options: Mystic cards ([mystic]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to five level 0 cards from any other class Deckbuilding requirements (do not count toward deck size): 1 random basic weakness.
name: Jim Culver
text:
Treat the modifier on [skull] tokens you reveal as "0".
Anytime you reveal a [eldersign] token, you may choose to instead treat it as a [skull] token.
[eldersign] effect: +1. If this skill test is successful during an attack, that attack deals +1 damage.

name: Teamwork
text: Investigators at your location may give or trade any number of Item assets, Ally assets, or resources among one another.

name: Double or Nothing
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
Double the difficulty of this skill test. If this skill test is successful, resolve the effects of the successful test twice.

name: Rite of Seeking
text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [lore]. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. If a [skull], [cultist], [thing], [monster], [fail] symbol is revealed during this test, after this test resolves lose all remaining actions and immediately end your turn.
